  https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/booking \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d '{

    "bookingdates" : {
        "checkin" : "2018-01-01",
        "checkout" : "2019-01-01"
    },
    "additionalneeds" : "Breakfast"
}'
